scripts.build-js: npm run jshint -s && (browserify app/settings.js -do settings.build.js & browserify app/executor.js -do executor.build.js & browserify -r app/service/asic -r app/service/ant -r app/service/mock -r app/service/avalon -do plugins.build.js)
scripts.watch-js: watchify app/settings.js -dvo settings.build.js & watchify app/executor.js -dvo executor.build.js & watchify -r app/service/asic -r app/service/ant -r app/service/mock -r app/service/avalon -dvo plugins.build.js
scripts.bsync: browser-sync start --files 'css/**/*.css, build.js, index.html, partial/**/*.html, img/**/*' --server
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-less
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-less
